title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: Park Home
body: A symbolic remembrance of the impact of violenceâ€¦  The outdoor symbolic memorial is a place of quiet reflection, honoring victims, survivors, rescuers and all who were changed forever on April 19, 1995. It encompasses the now sacred soil where the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building once stood, capturing and preserving forever the place and events that changed the world.              20th Anniversary of the Oklahoma Bombing   April 19 2015 marked the 20th anniversary of the 1995 bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building.
